text: dau che neah yeung ban bamphlanh krom ni muoy daoysaarte babakamm robsa ke . haey knongchamnaom puokke mean anakakhleah yeung ban banhchouh phlieng thm towleu ke ning anakakhleah knongchamnaom puokke trauv samrek yeang khlang chhk yk ke haey anakakhleah knongchamnaom puokke yeung ban thveu aoy dei sraub yk chivit robsa ke haey mean anak khleahtiet knongchamnaom puokke yeung ban ponlich knong tuk . haey a l laoh min chng thveubeab puokke laey te puokke te del ban thveubeab khluoneng noh
